text: Emikunda cho mwikulu charecheshelwa abamuria, emialo chilimwo amatsi kabulamwo obutukhulu, nende emialo chia mabeele kalaboyanga tawe, nende emialo cha amalwa keshiuya khubanywi, nende emialo chiobuushi obulafu tswe, ne balimwo nende tsimbia tsiosi tsebiamo, nende obulesheli okhurula khu Nyasaye wabu, bakhaba shinga baliba mumulilo tsinyanga tsioosi, nibanywesibwa amatsi kayile pia, nikateta amala kabu
